sentences: We are looking for dynamic forward thinking individuals to help maintain the successful growth of EpiquestLive
The ideal applicant must have previous experience of working within the medical software industry
Previous Sales experience is essential as well as an ability to survey potential projects and assist in the compilation of Tender Responses
A Competitive Salary and Performance Related Bonus will be offered to the successful candidate
In all instances please email your current CV, including details of current salary, to us at hello@epiquestlive
